editor.label: Continuous Integration - Trigger File
editor.description: A schedule that is enabled for ElectricSentry continuous integration using the modification time of a file.

formElement.label: Trigger file name(s):
formElement.documentation: The full path name of a file or set of files separated by a "|" character to be monitored.

formElement.label: Quiet time minutes:
formElement.documentation: The number of minutes required with no modification to the file before launching the procedure.

formElement.label: Enabled for ElectricSentry:
formElement.documentation: Enable for continuous integration monitoring by ElectricSentry.
